languages.text: Громогласное порицание слабости духа и тела вылилось в самовольные расправы над всеми, кто заикнулся о грозящих экипажу бедах. С соизволения бортовых исповедников пустотники взяли в свои руки приведение экипажа к должной морали — и преуспели в борьбе с разгоравшейся паникой.

A resounding condemnation of weakness of spirit and body led to arbitrary reprisals against anyone who dared even mention the troubles hanging over the crew. With the permission of the confessors, the voidsmen took the task of bolstering morale into their own hands and successfully quelled the rising panic.
languages.original_text: Громогласное порицание слабости духа и тела вылилось в самовольные расправы над всеми, кто заикнулся о грозящих экипажу бедах. С соизволения бортовых исповедников пустотники взяли в свои руки приведение экипажа к должной морали — и преуспели в борьбе с разгоравшейся паникой.

With the permission of the confessors, the voidsmen took bolstering morale into their own hands and successfully quelled the rising panic.

A resounding condemnation of weakness of spirit and body led to arbitrary reprisals against anyone who dared even mention the troubles hanging over the crew. With the permission of the confessors, the voidsmen took the task of bolstering morale into their own hands and successfully quelled the rising panic.

languages.text: 神圣的队伍猛烈地谴责那些肉体与精神软弱之人，激发了船员们的斗志。他们对一切胆敢宣扬不祥预兆之人采取了猛烈报复。在告解者的许可下，船员们自行承担起了鼓舞士气的任务，成功地平息了舰船上出现的恐慌情绪。
languages.original_text: A resounding condemnation of weakness of spirit and body led to arbitrary reprisals against anyone who dared even mention the troubles hanging over the crew. With the permission of the confessors, the voidsmen took the task of bolstering morale into their own hands and successfully quelled the rising panic.

traits.locale_text: 神圣的队伍猛烈地谴责那些肉体与精神软弱之人，激发了船员们的斗志。他们对一切胆敢宣扬不祥预兆之人采取了猛烈报复。在告解者的许可下，船员们自行承担起了鼓舞士气的任务，成功地平息了舰船上出现的恐慌情绪。

languages.text: Una contundente condena de la debilidad del espíritu y del cuerpo condujo a represalias arbitrarias contra cualquiera que se atreviera siquiera a mencionar los problemas que se cernían sobre la tripulación. Con el permiso de los confesores, los soldados del vacío se ocuparon de levantar la moral y lograron sofocar el pánico.
languages.original_text: A resounding condemnation of weakness of spirit and body led to arbitrary reprisals against anyone who dared even mention the troubles hanging over the crew. With the permission of the confessors, the voidsmen took the task of bolstering morale into their own hands and successfully quelled the rising panic.

traits.locale_text: Una contundente condena de la debilidad del espíritu y del cuerpo condujo a represalias arbitrarias contra cualquiera que se atreviera siquiera a mencionar los problemas que se cernían sobre la tripulación. Con el permiso de los confesores, los soldados del vacío se ocuparon de levantar la moral y lograron sofocar el pánico.

languages.text: 心と体の弱さを強く非難した事が、偶然にもクルーの中で浮かぶ悩みをわざわざ口に出した者達に対するブーメランになった。贖罪司祭の許可を受けて、ヴォイズマンは士気を上げる仕事を手に取り、高まる混乱を首尾よく抑え込んだ。
languages.original_text: A resounding condemnation of weakness of spirit and body led to arbitrary reprisals against anyone who dared even mention the troubles hanging over the crew. With the permission of the confessors, the voidsmen took the task of bolstering morale into their own hands and successfully quelled the rising panic.

traits.locale_text: 心と体の弱さを強く非難した事が、偶然にもクルーの中で浮かぶ悩みをわざわざ口に出した者達に対するブーメランになった。贖罪司祭の許可を受けて、ヴォイズマンは士気を上げる仕事を手に取り、高まる混乱を首尾よく抑え込んだ。

languages.text: Tous ceux qui osent évoquer les problèmes qui pèsent sur l'équipage sont déclarés coupables de faiblesse de corps et d'esprit, et subissent en conséquence un châtiment arbitraire. Avec l'autorisation des confesseurs, les cosmomarins se chargent de renforcer le moral de leurs troupes et parviennent à étouffer la panique dans l'œuf.
languages.original_text: A resounding condemnation of weakness of spirit and body led to arbitrary reprisals against anyone who dared even mention the troubles hanging over the crew. With the permission of the confessors, the voidsmen took the task of bolstering morale into their own hands and successfully quelled the rising panic.

traits.locale_text: Tous ceux qui osent évoquer les problèmes qui pèsent sur l'équipage sont déclarés coupables de faiblesse de corps et d'esprit, et subissent en conséquence un châtiment arbitraire. Avec l'autorisation des confesseurs, les cosmomarins se chargent de renforcer le moral de leurs troupes et parviennent à étouffer la panique dans l'œuf.

languages.text: Eine vehemente Verteufelung geistiger und körperlicher Schwäche führt zu willkürlichen Repressalien gegen jeden, der es wagt, die Sorgen der Crew auch nur zu erwähnen. Mit Erlaubnis der Konfessoren nehmen die Raumfahrer es selbst in die Hand, die Moral zu stärken, und ersticken die aufkommende Panik im Keim.
languages.original_text: A resounding condemnation of weakness of spirit and body led to arbitrary reprisals against anyone who dared even mention the troubles hanging over the crew. With the permission of the confessors, the voidsmen took the task of bolstering morale into their own hands and successfully quelled the rising panic.

languages.text: Ruh ve beden zayıflığını sert bir şekilde kınayan tören, mürettebat arasında yükselen paniği bastırmayı başardı. Günah çıkaranların izniyle uçsuz erleri, morali artırma görevini kendi ellerine aldı ve yaklaşan tehlikeye dair korkuları başarıyla yatıştırdı.
languages.original_text: A resounding condemnation of weakness of spirit and body led to arbitrary reprisals against anyone who dared even mention the troubles hanging over the crew. With the permission of the confessors, the voidsmen took the task of bolstering morale into their own hands and successfully quelled the rising panic.
